description:
When Vile Ranma starts a new PalTube Channel in hopes of recruiting new Lost Deck users, Subaru challenges him to a Buddyfight. But with Seiji`s freedom and Subaru`s own fate on the line, the gang has a lot to lose!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ranma Channel Kaisetsu!? Lost World Futatabi!
The Vile Ranma Channel Debuts? The Return of Lost World!
乱魔チャンネル開設!? ロストワールド再び!
